message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an introductory price of $7500. This offer is valid for the next 24 hours.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $5500. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $6000 for the product. This price includes a comprehensive warranty and a free consultation session to ensure you get the most out of the product.
I appreciate the additional features you're offering, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $5000?

Considering your feedback and the value you place on our product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a final offer of $5500 for the product, including all additional services and support. This is my best offer, and I hope it meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $4800?

I understand your budget concerns, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to extend the offer at $5200 for the product. This includes all the features and services we've discussed. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value the product offers.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $4600?

After reviewing your proposal, I am willing to consider a price of $5000 for the product. This includes all the benefits we've discussed, and I believe it strikes a good balance between our interests.
